column2: to tend towards sth/to do sth; to aim at sth/to do sth
therefore, so, for this (or that) reason
to define o.s., call o.s.; essersi definito
to be present, attend; witness; watch, supervise
to assist, look after, treat; avere assistito
to avoid, dodge, evade; avere evitato
to determine; bring about, cause; avere determinato
